import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './Form.css'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import axios from "axios" import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom" const Form = () => { const history = useNavigate() const [user, setUser] = useState({ username: "", email: "", password: "", address: "", contact_no: "", password2: "" } ) const handleChange = e => { const { username, value} = e.target setUser({ ...user, [username]:value }) } const Form = () => { const { username, email, password, address, contact_no, password2 } = user if(username && email && password && address && contact_no && (password === password2)){ axios.post("http://localhost:3000/Form", user) .then(res => { alert(res.data.message) history("/Login") }) }else{ alert("invalid input") } } return (
x

); }; export default Form;
